com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch

Interface LoaderBootstrap


  • public interface LoaderBootstrap
    Interface for the loader bootstrap, this is loaded in the parent classloader for convenience otherwise it would be necessary to call the initialisation functions using reflection which just gets boring very quickly.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
